page.title: 07Leisure In Chalfont St Peter
page.content: {Clubs} There are many activities available in our area including numerous clubs such as the Youth Club operating Mondays and Thursdays.There are also local Cricket,Tennis, Hockey,Golf,Sports and Social Clubs. {Entertainment} In addition,the Football Club provides entertainment on Saturday afternoons when spectators watch the local side play. {Arts And Crafts} The Community Centre runs lectures and Arts Festivals which are the two main features held there. The hall can also be hired out for functions and parties,dancing and music recitals etc. {Recreation} There is a Red Cross Society for juniors and adults which gives training courses in First Aid, Nursing,and Hygiene etc.There are scout and guide groups who camp,sail,climb, abseil,canoe and hike etc.
